def is_cutting_board_surrounded(table: item):
    # Check if there is a cutting board available on the table
    symbol has_cutting_board=exists o: item : is_cutting_board(o) and on(o, table)
    return has_cutting_board

behavior cut_chicken(chicken: item, cutting_board: item):
    body:
        achieve on(chicken, cutting_board)
        # Ensure the chicken is placed on the cutting board
        achieve cut(chicken)
        # Cut the chicken

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken)
        # Select the chicken to be sliced
        
        if exists table: item : is_kitchen_counter(table) and is_cutting_board_surrounded(table):
            # Check if there is a table with a cutting board to slice the chicken
            bind table: item where:
                is_kitchen_counter(table) and is_cutting_board_surrounded(table)
            # Bind the table with a cutting board available
            
            bind cutting_board: item where:
                is_cutting_board(cutting_board) and on(cutting_board, table)
            # Bind the cutting board on the table
            
            cut_chicken(chicken, cutting_board)
            # Slice the chicken using the cutting board
        
        else:
            foreach table: item:
                if is_kitchen_counter(table) and not visited(table):
                    observe(table,"Check if theres a cutting board on the kitchen counter")
                    # Observe all kitchen counters to ensure they have a cutting board
